item.title: Bottom-up to development a Loan Calculator
item.description: About the bottom-up development Bottom-up development is a style of developing programs. With the bottom-up development, we develop in the reverse inside-out fashion; that is, we develop the service classes first. To test the service classes, we write a temporary dummy main class.
